backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing added product catalog items and related files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated summaries for multiple frontend files outlining components, styles, data, and app logic.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles and OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app with title 'Vikash Sports'.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing navigation, cart state, product selection, checkout, and order history.
frontend/src/components/CartView.tsx: Displays cart items with quantity controls, pricing, and navigation to checkout.
frontend/src/components/CheckoutView.tsx: Checkout form capturing customer info and generating a mock order ID before confirming the order.
frontend/src/components/OrderConfirmatio: Shows order confirmation details including items, subtotal, and a continue shopping action.
frontend/src/components/OrderHistoryView: Renders past orders with item details, subtotal, and navigation back to products, showing an empty state when no orders exist.
frontend/src/components/ProductDetails.t: Displays detailed product info with an image gallery and add‑to‑cart button, including a fallback view when a product is missing.
frontend/src/components/ProductList.tsx: Shows a grid of product cards with images, price, description, and actions to view details or add to cart.
frontend/src/components/SportsShopHeader: Provides a sticky header with navigation to home, orders, and cart, showing the current cart count.
frontend/src/data/products.ts: Defines the Product interface and exports a static list of sample sports products with images and descriptions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the current identity, invalidating related queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements context and hooks for Internet Identity login, identity persistence, and status tracking using AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and sets extensive OKLCH-based CSS variables for light and dark themes, applying global border and body styles.
frontend/src/lib/orders.ts: Converts cart and customer form data into an order request and sends it to the backend to create an order, returning the order ID.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, radius, animations, and plugins, mapping CSS variables to theme values.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature list, requirements mapping, and current build state info.
